Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Marjaavaan* and its character Zoya?
Options:
A. a) Zoya is a mute Kashmiri girl who teaches children music.
B. b) *Marjaavaan* is a Hindi-language romantic action film.
C. c) Milap Milan Zaveri is the writer and director of *Marjaavaan*.
D. d) Zoya is a character in a comedy film.
Correct Answer:
a) Zoya is a mute Kashmiri girl who teaches children music. 
b) *Marjaavaan* is a Hindi-language romantic action film. 
c) Milap Milan Zaveri is the writer and director of *Marjaavaan*.
